conversation.message: I am highly enthusiastic about the opportunities at Company_A. Based on my qualifications and your needs, I believe I am an excellent fit. I am formally submitting my application now.

Since this is Round 1 and I am aiming for my top preference, applying directly ([APPLY]) to Company_A is the optimal strategy, assuming other seekers follow standard DA behavior and apply to their top choices as well.
